main.title: Hexareign
main.description: A prototype NFT game built on various fringe EVMs. Take over tiles, upgrade them, and harvest HEXR. Built with Solidity & Chainsafe's Unity SDK.

main.title: DicTater | 4X Potato Strategy
main.description: DicTater is a strategic micromanaging game that has constantly changing borders and wars. You will be forced to tap to run your administration, defend from enemy raids, and get saved from assassins! And of course, there are many, many, many  potatoes.

other.title: MoonJelly
other.description: An extendible chrome extension that interacts with Ocean Protocol's data economy. It makes it easy to mint datatokens, get datatoken alerts, view & search the market, and see your datatoken wallet.

other.title: HarkTV
other.description: An online-ticketed event platform powered by blockchain. After winning the Theta Hackathon, HarkTV will be moving on to ticketed events (powered by NFTs) while using the Theta technology to raise money for charity.

other.title: Jeremy Bot
other.description: A Discord bot that simulates Jeremy. It reads the bible, mumbles while it codes, yells while it plays video games, and has two soundtracks (gregorian and beans).

other.title: ERC721 Scanner
other.description: A frontend in React & a backend in Express that scans the Ropsten network for recently minted ERC721 projects. Uses EIP-165 to identify ERC721, caviats commented in the code.

other.title: SLIK | Lisk NFT Leveling
other.description: An extension of Lisk's example NFT project to include firebase accounts, essential NFT metadata, and NFT leveling.

other.title: Construction Supply Chain on Algorand
other.description: A proof of concept supply chain made with Reach and compiled into Algorand. First finished Algorand Project for a tiny hackathon.

other.title: Fractionalized Real Estate Platform
other.description: A front+backend for a fractionalized real estate platform; EVM compatibility pending. Built with react, typescript firebase, and solidity.

other.title: Node Visualizer
other.description: Our first foray into the hackathon world: a node visualizer for Monday.com. The video is cooler than the project. Too bad we didn't win a tesla.

other.title: Quiznomer
other.description: The first website we ever made: a knock-off buzzfeed quizzes website. Hosting quizzes like 'What Disney Princess are You?' while returning only Ratatouille rats, or 'How Much Are You Worth (in Kidneys)?' Sadly, a database error removed this from existence.
